## [Variablen Labels](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2151147/using-stata-variable-labels-in-r)

```{r,eval=F}
library(foreign)
dat <- read.dta("ZA5666_d_gesis_panel_campus_file_b_2014_STATA12.dta")
```

```{r,eval=F}
var.labels <- attr(dat,"var.labels")
```
